content:
Hey everyone, I am Sebastian from Vienna, Austria. I am currently studying compsci at uni and am getting started with Rust because it seems like a nice language for the future.
There are some topics I would love to contribute to and I feel like this chat is the right place to get my feet wet.
:wave:

@Sebastian Steiner Welcome! We have https://forge.rust-lang.org for general contributor documentation and the Rustc guide for working on the compiler itself. https://rust-lang.github.io/rustc-guide/about-this-guide.html if you have any questions feel free to ask. :slight_smile:
